verbose_text: Analysis of whole-mount urothelium isolated from Up2CreERT2; mTmG; nTnG mice 24 hr after UTI revealed beta-tubulin expression in Gfp positive mononucleated I-cells that were undergoing cytokinesis (XREF_FIG) as well as in binucleated I- and S-cells, which were negative for beta-tubulin and presumably post-mitotic (XREF_FIG, purple arrow-heads denote binucleated I-cells expressing nuclear Gfp, yellow arrowhead denotes a S-cell expressing membrane bound Gfp).
